alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; DeKalb; Gentry; Holt (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:21AM CDT until June 17 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... Northeastern Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Northwestern Clinton County in northwestern Missouri... Southern Gentry County in northwestern Missouri... Southeastern Holt County in northwestern Missouri... Andrew County in northwestern Missouri... DeKalb County in northwestern Missouri... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1220 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles north of Savannah to near Fillmore to near Highland, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Savannah, Wathena, Elwood, Maysville, Highland, Troy, Country Club Villa, Country Club, King City, Stewartsville, Agency, Union Star, Amazonia, Clarksdale, Easton, Bolckow, Rosendale, Cosby and Weatherby. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 40 and 68. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; DeKalb; Gentry; Holt
